sentences: Unen채os istud nagu pimedas kinos, kus "elavad pildid" vibelevad n채itelinal.
Pildid n채itasid linnade elu ja traditsioone.
context: The word 'pildid' is the plural form of 'pilt', which means picture, image, or photograph in English. It can refer to photographs, paintings, or any visual representation. In some contexts, it may specifically refer to early films as indicated by the dictionary definition mentioning "van film (filmikunsti algaegadel)" which translates to "old film (in the early days of cinema art)".
